City Council
============

### [Quick Links](https://www.sanangelo.gov/QuickLinks.aspx?CID=115)

1. [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.sanangelo.gov/490)
2. [City Charter / Code of Ordinances](https://library.municode.com/tx/san_angelo/codes/code_of_ordinances)
3. [City Council District Map](https://cosa1.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=1d4fca5a9f4c419da8d5374880a86b30)

1. [Meeting Calendar](https://www.sanangelo.gov/calendar.aspx?CID=24)
2. [Public Comment Request Form](https://www.sanangelo.gov/762)
3. [Watch Meetings](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLaCsTXh83Q6vmve91mtSeR4xSi5vOWI6a)

/QuickLinks.aspx

The City Council is a seven-member policy board for the City of San Angelo.

The Council meets twice a month at the McNease Convention Center, 500 Rio Concho Drive. Meetings are open to the public and are usually held on the first and third Tuesday of every month at 8:30 am

Discussions in Executive Session are confidential and cannot be discussed with the public.

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

Vision Statement
----------------

To be the Texas standard for opportunity, prosperity and quality of life.

Mission Statement
-----------------

To deliver excellence in services through best management practices; a dedicated, caring and productive workforce; innovative solutions and a strong commitment to fiscal responsibility.

City Council Strategic Priorities
---------------------------------

1. **Infrastructure**
   * Streets
   * Drainage
   * Water
2. **Economic development**
   * Development Services
   * Development Projects
   * Commercial Development
   * Industrial
3. **Public safety**
   * Police
   * Fire
4. **Employee compensation**

Additional Information
----------------------

Anyone who requires an auxiliary aid or service for effective communication, or a modification of policies or procedures to participate in a program, service or activity of the City of San Angelo, should [email Angela Bloss](mailto:Angela.Bloss@cosatx.us), [call 325-650-1814](tel:325-650-1814) or [fill out this online form](https://www.sanangelo.gov/739/ADA-Accommodation-Facility-Access-Reques) as soon as possible but no later than 48 hours before the scheduled event
